reviews.review: This is what its all been leading up to, Very good game (minus that damn safehouse level) but otherwise it is quite the amazing. Really wish we could see how it would officially end, but this will do for now.

The ending makes the entire hl community want more. VALVEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!! WE CAN TEACH YOU HOW TO COUNT TO 3!!! LIKE THIS: 1, 2, 3! NOT 1, 2, 2 episode 1, 2 episode 2, ALYX!!! (Don't skip math, kids)

Half-Life 2: Episode Two is the continuation of the story that started in Half-Life 2, and continued in the previous episode.
Graphics are improved in this game, with lighting feeling much better, and features a much more 'open feel' than the previous instalments, with the focus on driving being a fun addition to the game. Gameplay is however still largely the same.
The story is incredible. While again short, it is much better and longer than Episode One, and introduces the 'open world' of the Half-Life world. The final levels are tense and difficult, however are rewarding with a twist at the end that could change the entire story.
Half-Life 2: Episode Two gets an 8/10.

For more reviews check my Steam profile
